description: Senior Republican seeks to interview candidates for the position of Communications Director for a fast-paced office. The successful candidate will have excellent written and verbal skills as well as the proven ability to manage multiple communications projects. She/he will be responsible for developing, managing and coordinating all communications activities, including writing press releases, op-eds, mail pieces, talking points, organizing press events, maintaining the official website including design, implementing social media strategy including Facebook, Twitter, etc., maintaining press database, writing e-newsletters & coordinating Tele-town halls. Duties will also include early daily news clips, briefing the Member for radio interviews, writing and implementing PSA's from the Member, interacting with the press as the Member’s principal spokesperson and coordinating the Member’s overall press relations. The ideal candidate will have Hill experience and familiarity with New Jersey. Must be able to work extended hours and under time pressure.
responsibilities: Developing, managing and coordinating all communications activities
Writing press releases, op-eds, mail pieces, talking points
Organizing press events
Maintaining the official website including design
Implementing social media strategy including Facebook, Twitter, etc.
Maintaining press database
Writing e-newsletters
Coordinating Tele-town halls
Early daily news clips
Briefing the Member for radio interviews
Writing and implementing PSA's from the Member
Interacting with the press as the Member’s principal spokesperson
Coordinating the Member’s overall press relations
qualifications: Excellent written and verbal skills
Proven ability to manage multiple communications projects
Hill experience
Familiarity with New Jersey
Able to work extended hours
Able to work under time pressure
how_to_apply: Please email a resume, cover letter, and two writing samples to pressopportunity2014@gmail.com.
